ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and we constitute a vigilant majority.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But we are a fully accounted army."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But we are a numerous host, ever on guard."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And indeed we are an alert army.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But we are a host all assembled, amply forewarned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely we are a vigilant multitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and we are a host on our guard.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! we are a ready host.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: we are a large and watchful force."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily we are host well-provided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and we are alert and fully prepared.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But we are a multitude amply fore-warned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But we are host all assembled, amply fore-warned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and we are a host on our guard'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But we are a vigilant multitude.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:56] and indeed we are all on our guard’, ready (a variant reading [for hadhirūna] has hādhirūn, meaning ‘alert’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! we are a ready host) we are in doubt, and we will supply weapons. 410
